desc.p: Modify using the tcl set command.

variable.name: do_not_edit
variable.help: Do Not Edit notice for generated files.
variable.default: THIS FILE IS AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED. DO NOT EDIT

desc.p: Modify using the tcl set command.

variable.name: indent
variable.help: String of indent for generated files.

desc.p: Modify using the tcl set command.

variable.name: initial_indent
variable.help: Initial offset for indent for generated files.

desc.p: Modify using the tcl set command.

variable.name: line_wrap
variable.help: Boundary for wrapping a line in generated files.

desc.p: Modify using the tcl set command.
